channel.title: Help please (testscape source)
channel.description:
Hi and welcome to my thread
Right i need help..
I want to make myself admin but with testscape source i cant , because it wont let me change char files is there any other way of doing this
Thanks,
H3ll pure[br][size=1]Posted at: November 30, 2006, 12:14:25 PM[/size][hr]can anyone please help me if you also use the testscape source?[br][size=1]Posted at: November 30, 2006, 12:18:23 PM[/size][hr]please?? :|[br][size=1]Posted at: November 30, 2006, 12:19:45 PM[/size][hr]or can someone send me the pimpscape source internet adress? coz i know how to use that

item.title: Help please (testscape source)
item.dc:creator: @froggy226 froggy226
item.description:
@froggy226 wrote:

when I tried changing the name to “owner froggy” (my username) and had the number at 3 which is admin.

Read full topic

item.title: Help please (testscape source)
item.dc:creator: @Jump_On_Java Jump On Java
item.description:
@Jump_On_Java wrote:

Huh ! Eh, I Thought It Was -

1 - Player Moderator 2 - Game Moderator 3 - Administrator

Guess I’m Wrong ?

Read full topic

item.title: Help please (testscape source)
item.dc:creator: @froggy226 froggy226
item.description:
@froggy226 wrote:

I need to find out how too.
How are we suppsoed to find all this is clinet.java when it’s like a mile long???
I found osmething where its like 1 mod 2 owner 3 admin
then like a list of people with something like playerRights = 1 OR playerRights = 2 OR
playerRights = 3. do I change the players name with mine and then change their rights to owner?

Read full topic

item.title: Help please (testscape source)
item.dc:creator: @god_of_ikiliki god of ikiliki
item.description:
@god_of_ikiliki wrote:

Open client.java and search for

start of moderator/admin list

Under at the names add ur name

Read full topic

item.title: Help please (testscape source)
item.dc:creator: @Uniqaz Uniqaz
item.description:
@Uniqaz wrote:

open client.java, then search admin and replace with ur nick
